```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
penguin_species <- read_csv("lter_penguin_species.csv")
```

```{r}
penguin_subset <- penguin_species %>% 
  select(species:sex,-region) %>% 
  filter(sex == "FEMALE") %>% 
  mutate(body_mass_kg = body_mass_g/1000)
```

```{r}
ggplot(penguin_subset, aes(x = flipper_length_mm, y = body_mass_kg, color = species)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "",
    subtitle = "",
    caption = "",
    x = "Flipper Length (mm)",
    y = "Body Mass (kg)",
    col = "") + 
    theme_minimal() +  
    # This centers our title and subtitle  
    theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust= 0.5),
          plot.subtitle = element_text(hjust= 0.5))
```
